meanings.definition: A type of curved, single-edged sword originating in Turkey.
meanings.sent1: Legends tell of brave warriors wielding yataghans in battle.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed ancient yataghans from different regions.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the actor comically tripped over a yataghan prop.
meanings.sent4: His words were as sharp as a yataghan, cutting through the silence.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight gleamed off the polished yataghan, mesmerizing all who saw it.
